name: Logic Way
description:
Founded in 2004, Logic Way provides comprehensive IT services for small and medium-sized businesses. Our core expertise is advanced web applications development, software development for CAD/CAM/CAE systems, BI, System Integration, Business Process Management, Robotic Process Automation (RPA) and other comprehensive enterprise-level solutions development.
By now we have a significant experience in both custom projects "from scratch" and improvements to the existing solutions. 
In helping our clients to achieve their business goals through smart IT solutions, we take the whole responsibility - from project concept to its thorough implementation. 
Our success is made of happy stories of a trustful business relationship with several companies from Russia, Europe, Canada and the USA that made onetime customers our long-term partners.
